Package utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapParser
    The Map Parser utility parses the whole map file from disk.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLI
    This singleton utility class handles all the text commands for the game.
    ConcreteGameMapBuilder
    A concrete builder class for building the GameMap object.
    ConcreteGameStateBuilder
    This class is a concrete builder for the game's state.
    ConquestMapParser
    Parses - (Serialize,Deserializes) risk map of type Conquest
    ConquestMapParserTest
    test class to check the functionalities of ConquestMapParser.java ConquestMapParser
    DominationMapParser
    Parses - (Serialize,Deserializes) risk map of type Domination
    DominationMapParserTest
    test class to check the functionalities of DominationMapParser.java DominationMapParser
    GameMapBuilder
    This abstract class defines the methods for building the GameMap, used for saving the game.
    GameMapDirector
    Director for the GameMap
    GamePersistenceHandler
    Handles persistence of the game
    GamePersistenceHandlerTest
    Test class to check the functionalities of game save/load GamePersistenceHandler
    GameStateBuilder
    Abstract class for GameStateBuilder that is to be extended by ConcreteGameStateBuilder
    GameStateDirector
    Director for the GameState class Accepts a builder and constructs the GameState object
    MapAdaptor
    Adaptor class for conquest, domination maps
    MapValidator
    The Edit Map utility processes the editing commands.
    MapValidatorTest
    test class to check the functionalities of EditMap.java
